// src/pages/About.js import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Jiibly

{/* About Section */}

Our Mission

At Jiibly, our mission is to provide fast, reliable, and efficient delivery services to our customers. We are dedicated to ensuring your packages reach their destination safely and on time.

{/* Process Section */}

How It Works

  1. Place your order online or through our mobile app.
  2. Our delivery team picks up the package from your location or designated pickup point.
  3. We ensure the package is transported securely and swiftly.
  4. Your package is delivered to its destination on time.
{/* Why Choose Us */}

Why Choose Jiibly?

Reliability

We deliver packages with utmost care and on time, every time.

Security

Your packages are handled with the highest standards of security.

Customer Support

Our support team is here to assist you 24/7 with any concerns.

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Get Started?

); }; export default About;
